name: Equilibrium (itch) (Pinkuin game studios)
description:
Created in 1 week for Brackeys Game 2023.1

You are in control of a world recently destroyed.

Your job is to return balance to this world and maintain a striving ecosystem.

Give rabbits, foxes, bears, eagles, and songbirds a new place to live and explore.

Be careful though...

If you run out of credits and your species die out, your world is doomed to be forever lifeless.

Good Luck
